name: Tamilnaduleave
0:
”Alexa, open tamil nadu leave”
”Alexa, start tamil nadu leave”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tamil nadu leave
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming leaves for tamilnadu . Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.
